docs.text: Discord Step 1 - Bot Installation Access the link to add the Bot to your Discord group. https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1167312328610553966&permissions=2147486720&scope=bot Step 2 - Channel Subscription Go to the #textchat where you want to schedule the newsletter and run the command: /subscribe
